SQLFunctionSpec.Name: UFN_UMHS_PROSPECTPLANSUMMARY
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE function dbo.UFN_UMHS_PROSPECTPLANSUMMARY() returns table as return ( select U.ID, U.CONSTITUENTID, --C.ID as ConstituentID, ( select max(ACTUALDATE) from dbo.PROSPECTPLAN PP inner join dbo.USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I on I.PROSPECTPLANID=PP.ID where PP.PROSPECTID=C.ID ) LASTSTEP, case when PP.ISACTIVE = 1 and datediff(day,( select max(ACTUALDATE) from dbo.PROSPECTPLAN PP inner join dbo.USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I on I.PROSPECTPLANID=PP.ID where PP.PROSPECTID=C.ID ),getdate())>=90 then 'RES:warning' else '' end NORECENT, ( select min(I.EXPECTEDDATE) from PROSPECTPLAN PP inner join dbo.USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I on I.PROSPECTPLANID=PP.ID where PP.PROSPECTID=C.ID and I.ID = dbo.UFN_PROSPECTPLAN_GETNEXTSTEP(PP.ID) and I.COMPLETED=0 ) NEXTSTEP, NF.NAME, U.KEYNAME, DBO.USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTION_GETSITELIST(I.ID) AS SITES from dbo.USR_UMHS_DATA U left join dbo.CONSTITUENT C on C.ID = U.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I on I.PROSPECTPLANID = C.ID left outer join dbo.PROSPECTPLAN PP on PP.PROSPECTID=C.ID outer apply dbo.USR_UFN_UMHS_DISPLAYNAME(U.ID) NF --outer apply dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME(C.ID) NF where dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_ISPROSPECT(C.ID) = 1 )
